ygData.subject: Re: Illegible cantrips?
ygData.msgSnippet: Illegible cantrips are found in East commons methinks, and are part of a quest, not used for research. Oh, and anyone on Karana server, I have a dark elf necro
ygData.messageBody:
Illegible cantrips are found in East commons methinks, and are part
of a quest, not used for research.

Oh, and anyone on Karana server, I have a dark elf necro and an erudian
enchanter. Anyone interested, perhaps we can meet somewhere and
exchange language info. My necro knows several languages, including
elder elvish, dark elvish, etc, while the enchanter knows elder
erudian.

Snicker wrote:
>
> From: Snicker <snicker@...>
>
> I've found an illegible cantrip - any clues on what it's good for?
>
> Talies on Bristlebane
> http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/eqbard.htm
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> How many communities do you think join ONElist each day?
> http://www.onelist.com
> More than 1,000!
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> This list is intended for the trade of Spell components for spell research. Please keep the emails on topic.
